name: A South Sea Tale
description:
A short adventure about birth and magic at the sea. Navigate through dialog options to uncover stories!

Inspiration ranges from Corto Maltese, Jack London novels, Kentucky Route Zero and many others.

Free to download, but donations are welcome.

Please follow Carmelo electronics for updates:

https://www.instagram.com/carmeloelectronics/

https://twitter.com/carmeloelectron

https://www.facebook.com/carmeloelectronics/

Idioma español en el menú de opciones (Esc)

A Graphic Adventure by

Tabique Malévolo

Music by

Alejandro Diosdado

Tabique Malévolo
